# init(fairPlayStreamingKeyResponseData:)

**Initializer**

Creates a content key response with an encrypted key response data blob when FairPlay Streaming is the key delivery method.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(fairPlayStreamingKeyResponseData keyResponseData: Data)
```

## Parameters

- **keyResponseData**: The key data from the FairPlay Streaming key server.

## Return Value

Returns a new [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContentKeyResponse] object to decrypt content.

## Discussion

Use the results of this initializer when the content key session creates a key request using the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContentKeySystem/fairPlayStreaming] parameter. The results are then passed to the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContentKeyRequest/processContentKeyResponse(_:)] method to supply the decrypter with key data.

## Creating new content key responses

- **init(clearKeyData:initializationVector:)**: Creates a new key response object for key data and initialization vector sent in the clear.
- **init(authorizationTokenData:)**: Creates a content key response with an authorization token.
